mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT C_ID, C_NAME, BANK_NUM, ROUND(PRICE*0.85) AS D_AMOUNT, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM') || '-05' AS D_DATE FROM COMPANY C JOIN MEMBER M ON(C.M_ID=M.M_ID) JOIN ( SELECT C_ID, SUM(PRICE) AS PRICE FROM ( SELECT PD.PD_ID, PD.PRICE, P.PA_ID, RE.R_SDATE, RE.R_EDATE, RO.R_ID, C.C_ID, C.C_NAME, M.BANK_NUM FROM PAY_DETAIL PD JOIN PAYMENT P ON(PD.PA_ID=P.PA_ID) JOIN RESERVATION RE ON(RE.PA_ID=PD.PA_ID) JOIN ROOM RO ON(RE.R_ID=RO.R_ID) JOIN COMPANY C ON(RO.C_ID=C.C_ID) JOIN MEMBER M ON(C.M_ID=M.M_ID) WHERE TO_CHAR(RE.R_EDATE,'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1),'YYYYMM') AND PA_ID NOT IN ( SELECT PA_ID FROM PAY_DETAIL WHERE PD_TYPE = 'R')) GROUP BY C_ID) USING(C_ID) WHERE C_ID NOT IN( SELECT C_ID FROM DEPOSIT_HISTORY WHERE TO_CHAR(D_DATE,'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM')))
